name: Internal Knowledge Assistant - Setup - Initial Bulk Upload

parameters.content:
"üì• Document Source"
Automatically lists all company documents from Google Drive

"üìÑ Document Extraction"
Downloads any document and extracts the text with Unstructured.io (PDF, DOCX, TXT,MD, Google DOCS)

"‚úÇÔ∏è Text Processing"
Splits documents into chunks of 500 tokens and creates a vector representation with OpenAI text-embedding-3-small

"üíæ Hybrid Storage"
Vector embeddings to Pinecone, stores metadata to Supabase (dual database architecture)
